name: Fragile Goods!
description:
The browser version is ultra low graphics and doesn't support the leader boards so I would recommend downloading for the full experience 

Fragile goods is a game created for the 2nd GoedWare game jam with the theme  fragile.

Instructions

Drive with WASD or use a controller

Drive to the highlighted areas to pick up and deliver parcels

If you car becomes stuck at any point press the Y button or R Key to reset your car

Everything in this game was built for the Jam by myself and the music was also created especially for this game by the talented Charlotte McMillan.

In the game you play as a delivery driver delivering fragile goods to homes all around the small island "newbie city". The aim of the game is to deliver as many Parcels as possible in the time given, if you drop a parcel you will need to go collect another, if you successfully deliver a parcel you will be rewarded with cash and a time bonus based on the distance of the objective. 

There are a few things in your way to look out for in the game such as pot holes, risky shortcuts and speed cameras that will take cash away from you. 

The game is fully mapped for controller support and plays best with one , I have included a couple of downloads available to cater for anyone who wants to give it a try, so you can play windowed mode or low graphics mode, however the game is probably best enjoyed in full screen and full graphics.

Do your best to earn as much money as possible and climb your way to the top of the leader board! Any questions or suggestions about the game feel free to leave a comment!

Have fun.
